text: RT @dhirajkacker: Congrats to everyone involved! A wonderful company. All the best team @practo  https://t.co/yNz5WBZKd9
10/10. Amazingly
column4: the @Practo team is as hungry as I have ever seen it. They are fired up to keep going for years and years @shashanknd

text: 9/10 @Praco is making a real impact on society. Solving problems in an industry that touches everyone. Its a privilege to be part of it.
8/10 @Practo is now the #1 healthcare platform in india. Tens of millions of patients have directly/indirectly used it
7/10. Practo evolved and built moat through products & onboarding doctors. One practice at a time. Driving adoption. No short cuts.
6/10. We believed that healthcare had to adopt technology
column4: even if it took time. @Practo would build a unified healthcare platform for India

text: 5/10. But @shashanknd and the @Practo team were on a mission. A mission we found deeply inspiring.
4/10. There was no easy gmv growth via discounting. Healthcare is not the fastest mkt. Its a late adopter of technology
3/10. For the next 46 months (until Feb15)
column4: Sequoia was the only VC in practo's cap table
column5: leading 3 rounds. Those ~4 years were not easy

text: 2/10. Sequoia first invested < $0.5M in Practo 53 months ago in March 2011.
1/10 Its easy to put all start-ups in the same bucket. Some stories are different. @Practo is one of them.
